price: 10. Maka tunggulah pada hari ketika langit membawa kabut yang tampak jelas,*(793)
arabic: فَٱرۡتَقِبۡ يَوۡمَ تَأۡتِي ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٖ مُّبِينٖ
footnotes: *793). Bencana kelaparan yang menimpa kaum Quraisy karena mereka menentang Nabi Muhammad -ṣallallāhu 'alaihi wa sallam-

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-ir'taqib yawma tatī al-samāu bidukhānin mubīnin
